TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InternalRemotingServices extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines utility methods for use by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You do not need to call the `static` methods of the InternalRemotingServices class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You do not need to call the `static` methods of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.InternalRemotingServices> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute GetCachedSoapAttribute(object reflectionObject) cil managed

Docs.param: A class member or method parameter.
Docs.summary: Gets an appropriate SOAP-related attribute for the specified class member or method parameter.
Docs.returns: The SOAP-related attribute for the specified class member or method parameter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You do not need to call the `static` methods of the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.InternalRemotingServices> class.
A `"_LOGGING"` preprocessing symbol is applied to the method by means of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ConditionalAttribute> attribute.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.SoapAttribute> class is the base class for various SOAP-related attribute classes in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata> namespace.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Sends any number of messages concerning remoting channels to an internal debugger.
